sub_title: Functioneel Applicatiebeheerder + bij GGD GHOR Nederland
summary: Certified in Agile Business Foundation, Professional Scrum Facilitation Skills (PSFS), SAFe 6 Agilist, SAFe 5 Agilist, Agile Hybrid Project Pro Micro-Credential, JSE – Certified Entry-Level JavaScript Programmer, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2022 Certified Foundations Associate, Oracle Cloud Data Management 2022 Foundations Associate, TeamsOps Practioner, Business Intelligence Foundation BIFPC™,  PCEP – Entry-Level Python Programmer, Post-bachelor Module: Data Science (Avans+), BVOP™ Chief Executive, DevOps Essentials DEPC®, Post-bachelor Module: Scrum and Agile (Avans+), BVOP™ Agile Director, Design Sprint CPDSC™, User Stories Foundations USFC™, Kanban Foundation - KIKF™, C2 Proficiency in English (EF SET), Scrum Master Professional - SMPC®, Scrum Foundation Professional SFPC™, HBO BA P Communications, Professional Scrum Product Owner 3™, Blockchain & Healthcare Professional™, CCT Supporting Cisco Routing and Switching Network Devices (RSTECH) v3.0, Blockchain Expert™, Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (CLSSBB)™, Business Process Manager (BPM)®, Professional Scrum™ with User Experience 1, Professional Agile Leadership™ Evidence-Based Management, Professional Scrum Developer™ 1, Professional Scrum with Kanban™ 1, Scaled Professional Scrum™ 1, Professional Scrum Product Owner™ 2, Professional Agile Leadership™ 1, Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt (CLSSYB)®, Professional Scrum Master™ 1, Professional Scrum Master™ 2, Professional Scrum Product Owner™ 1, TMap® Suite Test Engineer, Cloud Computing Foundation, ITIL 4 Foundation CPD, and MD-100 Modern Desktop.

treasury_media.title: Professional Scrum Product Owner™ 3
treasury_media.description: Anyone who has completed the Professional Scrum Product Owner™ level I and II tests and wants to show their ability to apply the Scrum framework to real-world product ownership challenges may take the PSPO III assessment. Those who pass the exam will be awarded the industry-recognized PSPO III Certification for their advanced knowledge and skills in Scrum and the Scrum Product Owner position.

treasury_media.title: Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (CLSSBB)™
treasury_media.description: Black Belts operate under Master Black Belts to apply Six Sigma methodology to specific projects. They devote 100% of their valued time to Six Sigma. They primarily focus on Six Sigma project execution and special leadership with special tasks, whereas Champions and Master Black Belts focus on identifying projects/functions for Six Sigma. Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (CLSSBB) is well versed in the Lean Six Sigma Methodology who leads improvement projects, typically in a full-time role.

treasury_media.title: Leading SAFe (SA) 6.0
treasury_media.description: A Certified SAFe® 6 Agilist (SA) is a SAFe Enterprise leadership professional who leads and sustains the Lean-Agile transformation. Key areas of competency include the application of Lean-Agile mindset and principles, the release of value through Agile Release Trains (ARTs), and building an Agile portfolio to align strategy and execution.

treasury_media.title: Leading SAFe (SA) 5.1
treasury_media.description: A Certified SAFe® 5 Agilist (SA) is a SAFe enterprise leadership professional who is part of a Lean-Agile transformation. Key areas of competency include the application of Lean-Agile principles, execution and release of value through Agile Release Trains (ARTs), and building an Agile portfolio with Lean-Agile budgeting.

treasury_media.title: Professional Scrum Product Owner™ 2
treasury_media.description: Professional Scrum Product Product Owner II (PSPO II) certificate holders demonstrate an advanced level of Professional Scrum Product Ownership knowledge and understanding of how the Scrum framework can support the creation of value. They have shown an understanding of topics including product vision, product backlog management, release and portfolio planning, business strategy, and working with stakeholders.

treasury_media.title: Professional Scrum Product Owner™ 1
treasury_media.description: Has demonstrated a fundamental level of product ownership, proving an intermediate understanding of the Scrum framework and how to apply it it maximize the value delivered with a product. This individual has also demonstrated an understanding of how to maximize return on investment and optimize the total cost of ownership of products and systems.

treasury_media.title: Certified Chief Executive
treasury_media.description: The Business Value-Oriented Principles (BVOP™) teach the modern CEO that they have to be fully dedicated to all management offices and focus on the People, Program, and Project management processes when organizational strategies are focused on product development.

treasury_media.title: BVOP™ Agile Director
treasury_media.description:
Modern managers and directors in Agile enterprises need specialized and current certifications. Managing Agile companies, products, and teams is a complicated process that, in addition to duties, needs a great deal of expertise and rigorous credentials.

The qualified BVOP Agile Director establishes and controls at the highest level the Agile organization's culture, procedures, practices, and workflows.

treasury_media.title: Post-bachelor Module: Data Science
treasury_media.description: Constant innovation has led to an increase in data creation and utilization. Consider the extensive automation of processes, the use of models to forecast results and further automation of these models, and the utilization of a range of data-producing sensors. All technological advancements that simplify the processing of massive amounts of data.

courses.name: Atos eSuite grafische editor (Zaak Gericht Werken)

profile_positions.description:
• Facilitating daily stand-up meetings, helping the team to discuss project progress and identify and resolve any obstacles.
• Coaching the team to apply and improve agile and scrum principles.
• Organizing sprint planning, retrospectives, and demos to monitor and discuss project progress.
• Identifying and resolving any hindrances and issues that may prevent the team from successfully completing the sprint.
• Maintaining the product backlog and ensuring good communication between the product owner and the development team.
• Implementing agile and scrum best practices to improve the quality and speed of the development process.
• Working on continuous improvement of the team and the process through feedback loops and implementing changes.
• Supporting the product owner in prioritizing tasks and managing the scope of the project.
• Encouraging collaboration between functional managers and the development team to ensure that eSuite is optimally developed and aligned with customer requirements.
• Facilitating knowledge sharing between functional managers and the development team to ensure efficient work and keep eSuite development on schedule.
• Supporting the team in improving quality by facilitating reviews and testing.
• Monitoring project progress and reporting results to stakeholders to ensure the project stays on schedule and within budget.
• Knowledge of ITIL, BiSL, Lean, Prince2, RPA, Agile/Scrum, Power Apps/Power FX formulas and SAFe 5.0/6.0.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master eSuite

profile_positions.description: I have further developed a tool called "EZW Audit List 2023". This tool helps us better understand how the eSuite processes work and what their functional IDs are. In this tool, we can find information about each process, such as its owner, the departments involved, and the technical details. This makes it easier for the various clusters/departments to understand how the processes in our organization work.
profile_positions.title: Power Apps Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Managing first-line support for users in the use of information systems.
• Analyzing and prioritizing incidents and changes.
• Coordinating with second-line support and system administrators for solutions to complex incidents.
• Maintaining and optimizing information systems and developing user manuals and procedures.
• Training and guiding users in the proper use of information systems and procedures.
• Developing and implementing process improvements to improve service to users.
• Monitoring the performance of information systems and reporting deviations to management.
• Contributing to the development of Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for the functional management process.
• Managing and processing changes.
• Providing reports on outstanding authorization requests upon request.
• Receiving and registering incoming incidents.
• Resolving incidents.
• Forwarding incidents to second-line solution groups, including monitoring.
• Answering questions from the user organization.
• Providing group training to the user organization.
• Receiving and registering desired changes to the application.
• Testing implemented changes, including preparing test scripts and documenting findings.
• Analyzing work processes.
• Proposing automation improvement goals.
• Knowledge of ITIL, BiSL, Lean, Prince2, RPA, and Scrum.
• Robotic Process Automation using UiPath.
• Functional management of the eSuite software.
• Knowledge of configuring and customizing eSuite software.
• Strong understanding of business processes and how they relate to eSuite functionality.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
• Strong project management skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities.
• Modeling processes for "open" forms in the eSuite.

profile_positions.title: Functioneel Beheerder eSuite

profile_positions.description:
[Presentations ↓]
# Introduction to Agile/Scrum presentation on October 27th, 2022.

On October 27th, 2022, I gave an Introduction to Agile/Scrum presentation to igen. The presentation covered the basics of the Agile methodology and the Scrum framework, including key concepts such as iterative development, agile principles, and the roles and responsibilities of a Scrum team. The aim of the presentation was to provide an overview of Agile and Scrum and to help igen understand how these approaches can be applied in software development. Overall, the presentation was well received and provided valuable insights into the benefits and best practices of Agile and Scrum.

profile_positions.description:
• Implementation and execution of Scrum/Agile in the team.
• Removing obstacles within the team.
• Create an environment for the team in which they can work effectively.
• Address team dynamics.
• Protect the team from outside interruptions and distractions. 
• Collaborate with others to improve the effectiveness of Scrum in the organization.
• Responsible for the daily import of accounts to guarantee the continuity of employees of 25 municipal health services.
• Guiding and implementing new projects.
• Automating work processes using VBA Excel.
• Provide support to users of the information system.
• Solving, following up and documenting incidents with regard to the information system and / or the information provision.
• Maintaining contacts with suppliers, specialists and users.
• Management and allocation of user rights.
• Processing and prioritizing (ad hoc) information requests.
• Drawing up requirements and functional specifications for the information system.
• Drafting of product descriptions and user manuals.
• Conducting and supervising acceptance tests.
• Advising on, for example, timelines and cost consequences.
• Identifying and reporting (future) problems and threats.
• Translate information needs into appropriate functionalities.
• Registering incidents and their causes to prevent a recurrence.
• Manage, prioritize and process change requests.
• Determining the impact of changes in business processes.
• Report on pending and committed change requests.
• Mendix support with control, monitoring, implementation, ideation, development and testing.
• Create process flowcharts (e.g. Swimlane diagrams)
• Anonymizing patient records according to GDPR legislation
• Ensure that the data collection is and remains qualitatively good.
• Create visualizations and reports from the collected data.
• Deploy dynamic dashboards with Power BI.
• Answer data analysis issues.
